# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersions | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersions ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-preReleaseVersions)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersions 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersions

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-preReleaseVersions#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/preReleaseVersions
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-preReleaseVersions#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-preReleaseVersions#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-preReleaseVersions#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppPreReleaseVersionsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appprereleaseversionslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-preReleaseVersions#see-also)

### [Getting app build and prerelease version information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-preReleaseVersions#Getting-app-build-and-prerelease-version-information)

[`List All Builds of an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-builds)Get a list of builds associated with a specific app.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/builds`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-builds)[`List All Prerelease Versions for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-prereleaseversions)Get a list of prerelease versions associated with a specific app.
